Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.pages.ext.jsp

[Groovy] Class TagLibraryResolverImpl

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.pages.ext.jsp.TagLibraryResolverImpl
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      GrailsApplicationAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, TagLibraryResolver, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware

      @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class TagLibraryResolverImpl

      Resolves all of the available tag libraries from web.xml and all available JAR files. Kudos to the Freemarker (http://freemarker.sourceforge.net/) library for providing the inspiration for this code.

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
